blog.name: drjohnhwatson
blog.title: Crime is Common, Logic is Rare
blog.description: I'm a 29 year old lady bearing the name Devon. I am a writer when I shake off the laziness.  I love Raffles & pretty much every Sherlock Holmes adaptation (some quite a bit more than others, however).  History is my passion, especially the Victorian Era and Theatre.  Finally, it is physically impossible for me to stop talking about Kyrle Bellew & Frank A. Connor.

summary: Listening to Michael Sheen talk about his relationship with and career in theatre makes me wish I could have seen his production...

Listening to Michael Sheen talk about his relationship with and career in theatre makes me wish I could have seen his production of Hamlet.

I love a good, modern approach to classic works.

title: There, I fixed it...

So, I couldn’t help myself and did the thing :)…
